Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HaeDfsin (UCSS1a; 3S=S, defensin, natural AMPs; ticks, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature.Author: Yang X, Zhang H, Zuo Z, Qin C, Liu Y, Cao Z, Wu Y.2024
Literature.Reference: Int J Biol Macromol. 2024 Oct 31:137151. doi: 10.1016/j.ijbiomac.2024.137151.PubMed
Literature.Title: Novel structural determinants and bacterial death-related regulatory effects of the scorpion defensin BmKDfsin4 against gram-positive bacteria

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (97.37%) toDefDM defensinC=R=G: 16%. GRAVY: -0.63; mol Wt: 4273.978; mol formula: C175H285N63O49S6; mol ex coeff: 3355.Chemical modification: 3 disulfide bonds.Activity: active against S. aureus (MIC 0.21-1.5 uM) and S. epidermidis (MIC 0.38 uM). Warning: other bacteria not tested.
